description: Try our easy to follow Crumbed Barramundi With Peas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Fish,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Nikki P,Sesame free,Peanut free,Barramundi
name: Crumbed Barramundi With Peas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Combine crumbs, coriander, garlic and oil in a bowl. Spread top of each fish fillet with yoghurt. Season with salt and pepper. Press crumb mixture onto the yoghurt, pressing on firmly. Place onto a baking paperlined tray. Spray with oil. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until golden, depending on thickness of the fillets.

Meanwhile, place peas, stock and mint in a pan and bring to the boil over mediumhigh heat. Simmer for 5 minutes. Discard mint, strain peas, reserving 1/3 cup of stock. Return peas to pan. Add butter and reserved stock and season to taste. Keep warm.
Serve the fish on a bed of butter lettuce, with peas, lemon wedges and extra mint.
